hero.title: Tough Guy Sunglasses
hero.subtitle: Pacific S01
hero.description: French elegance. The style that's making waves. The sunglasses that conquered social media and celebrities. Premium aviator design, guaranteed badass attitude.
hero.descriptionFootnote: *Tested and approved by the biggest personalities (and their communication advisors).
hero.altImage: Pacific S01 sunglasses - Tough guy style

trend.title: The Look That's Making Waves
trend.intro: Discreet elegance that leaves a mark. These sunglasses have conquered social media and celebrities. Tough guy style, badass attitude, timeless design. The look you need to assert your personality with refinement.
trend.introFootnote: Perfect for important meetings, official photos, and moments when you need to "get the job done".

cards.trendDesc: The style that's killing it on TikTok, Instagram and Twitter.
cards.attitudeDesc: A tough guy look that asserts your personality.
cards.attitudeNote: Perfect for saying "I own it" without opening your mouth.
cards.premiumDesc: French quality, timeless design, refined finish.
cards.premiumNote: Like fine wine, it gets better with time (and photos).

features.title: Why Pacific S01?
features.intro: French excellence. The tough guy style that combines trend, quality and protection. Craftsmanship that honours tradition while embracing modernity.
features.introFootnote: Because sometimes, you need to "get the job done" with style.
features.uvDesc: Full protection against UVA and UVB rays. Your eyes are protected, your style is assured.
features.uvNote: And incidentally, it hides dark circles after a long night of work.
features.qualityDesc: Robust metal frame, high-quality lenses. A look that lasts, a style that makes a statement.
features.franceDesc: French design and manufacturing. Quality, authenticity, pride. French craftsmanship at its peak, as excellence demands.
features.franceNote: 100% French, 0% compromise. Like our favourite president.
